name: Burst Into
description:
Burst Into is an indie game that will give you a break with your friends on the chosen map. You can arrange a grandiose PVP on a small or large map with a partially or completely destructible environment, it all depends on your choice when creating a room. Also you can fight people for rating in different modes.
If you suddenly did not find the mode to your liking, just wait for the update, we will regularly add new maps with unique modes.
_________________
Features:
1) Multiplayer
2) Change of time of day and weather conditions.
3) Transport, which will be your ally during any fight.
4) Destruction. Each card has its own fracture rate. This will allow you to play fun even on weak computers.
5) Updates. We will update and update much, listening to your opinion.
6) Voice and text chat for easy communication.
7) Ability to create a room and play with friends.
